meanings.definition: The middle class regarded as conventional or conservative in outlook.
meanings.sent1: The booboisies in our neighborhood always follow the same traditions.
meanings.sent2: She felt like she didn't fit in with the booboisies at the country club.
meanings.sent3: At the party, the booboisies were discussing the most traditional recipes.
meanings.sent4: The booboisies stood out like a sore thumb in the vibrant city crowd.
meanings.sent5: The image of the booboisies in their suits and ties was etched in her mind.

meanings.definition: Members of the middle class who are perceived as being conventional or conservative.
meanings.sent1: The booboisies at the meeting all nodded in agreement.
meanings.sent2: She avoided the booboisies at work who always played it safe.
meanings.sent3: The booboisies organized a traditional bake sale for charity.
meanings.sent4: Among the artists, he felt like a booboisie in a sea of creativity.
meanings.sent5: The presence of the booboisies at the event added a sense of familiarity.
